introduction: When you're the drunkest person at your daughter's eighteenth birthday party, it's probably time to hit the bathroom... That's the harsh reality 48 year old Valerie has to face as she fails to cope with the repercussions of her imminent divorce. When a prank leaves her locked in the bathroom with over-eager teenager Andrew, her moment of tranquility quickly turns into a clumsy mess, until an unexpected bond develops between the two strangers. Starring Olivier Award-winning actress Janie Dee and acclaimed young actor Reece Noi, The Bathroom is a charming short comedy written and directed by award-winning playwright Sam Peter Jackson, with music by Grammy-winning composer David Arnold.
